title: Accept Underwriting Decision and Pay for Policy
description: An applicant for life insurance has been approved at a higher rate than quoted (rated) and decides to accept the offer.

tasks.description: Retrieve the final underwriting offer for the applicant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the approved, rated offer.

tasks.description: Collect the applicant's acceptance of the rated policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the applicant agrees to the new premium.

tasks.description: Take the initial premium payment and issue the policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the first payment and places the policy in force.
